item.title: Fantasy Football Buzz: Justin Herbert set for surgery, but aims to play in Week 14
item.description: Herbert set for surgery, Meyers keeps producing for the Jaguars and Irving looked good in his return in Week 14

item.title: Winners and losers: Robinson runs wild, Adams makes history
item.description: Bijan Robinson, A.J. Brown and Patrick Mahomes led the way, but Lamar Jackson and Saquon Barkley disappointed.

item.title: AUSL Softball Expansion Draft 2025: How to watch on ESPN
item.description: The AUSL expands from four to six teams as Cascade and Oklahoma City Spark make their first picks in the 2025 expansion draft.

item.title: Lane Kiffin, Thanksgiving and CFB conference champs: A busy weekend at the sportsbooks
item.description: How sportsbooks are evaluating Ole Miss and the College Football Playoff race, and more on NFL underdogs winning big on Thanksgiving.

item.title: NFL futures: Rams remain Super Bowl favorites despite loss
item.description: Updated win totals and odds for every team to make the playoffs, win their division, conference and Super Bowl.
